text: Jean-Michel Savéant (September 19, 1933 - August 16, 2020) was a French chemist. His works focused in electrochemistry. He was elected member of the French Academy of Sciences in 2000. He was foreign associate of the National Academy of Sciences in 2001. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French chemists Category:People from Rennes
title: Jean-Michel Savéant
